name: Beyond The Heavens (itch)
description:
Beyond The Heavens is a arcade style shoot-em-up where you take control of a ship seeking to reach the destination that calls out to it.

The journey will take place across several worlds including Heaven and Hell!

You will have the ability to upgrade your ship and weapons as you progress to help you face any who stand in your way and even face off against Death itself on occasion.

Beyond The Heavens also features a soundtrack/jukebox to enjoy all the music included in the game that will unlock as you progress.

I sincerely hope you enjoy the game and any feedback you may have would be greatly appreciated!

Also you can enjoy the music from the game by either buying or streaming from the links/widget below!
